All searches default to alpha unless otherwise specified. Note: Alpha searches will query the system for the specified criteria and return results that contain the criteria in the initial position of a word. i.e. If the user searches for "apple" the System will return Apple Inc. and Appleton Farms, but will not return SnappleCo or Crabapple Bakery. "Contains" (Keyword) searches will query the system for the specified criteria and return results that contain the criteria in any place within a word. i.e. If the user searches for "apple", the System will return Apple Inc., Appleton Farms, SnappleCo., and Crabapple Bakery.

Tout fouy default nan alfa sòf si otreman espesifye. Remak: rechèch Alpha pral sijè rechèch sistèm nan pou kritè yo espesifye ak rezilta retounen ki gen kritè yo nan pozisyon inisyal la nan yon mo. sa vle di si itilizatè a fouye pou "pòm" Sistèm lan pral retounen Apple Inc. ak Farms Appleton, men li pa pral retounen SnappleCo oswa Crabapple Bakery. "Li gen ladan" (Keyword) rechèch ap fè rechèch sou sistèm nan pou kritè yo espesifye ak rezilta retounen ki gen kritè yo ki nan nenpòt kote nan yon mo. sa vle di si itilizatè a ap chèche "pòm", sistèm lan pral retounen Apple Inc., Appleton Farms, SnappleCo., ak Crabapple Bakery.

Consistently with state and federal laws and regulations governing the confidentiality of unemployment
                    compensation information, the Massachusetts Department of Unemployment Assistance (DUA) seeks to protect
                    the data privacy of persons using UI Online. The DUA website uses “cookies.” That is, we store a small
                    text file on your computer. The only information in the cookie is a system-generated identification
                    number that we use only to maintain continuity during your use of UI Online and for the security of the
                    webpages you access. Also, when you access the DUA website, we collect the IP address of the computer you
                    are using. We use the IP address to make sure that, if you are applying or certifying for benefits, you
                    are doing so from the United States or Canada, and for system maintenance. We do not disclose your IP
                    address to third-parties, unless we determine that we need to do so for purposes of DUA program integrity.
                    We treat your use of UI Online as your consent to our collection of these data.

Toujou ak lwa eta a ak règleman federal ki gouvène konfidansyalite nan chomaj
                    enfòmasyon sou konpansasyon, Depatman Asistans pou Chomaj nan Massachusetts (DUA) ap chèche pwoteje
                    konfidansyalite done moun ki itilize UI sou entènèt. Sit entènèt DUA a itilize "bonbon." Sa se, nou sere yon ti
                    dosye tèks sou òdinatè ou. Enfòmasyon an sèlman nan bonbon la se yon idantifikasyon sistèm-pwodwi
                    nimewo ke nou itilize sèlman yo kenbe kontinwite pandan itilize ou nan UI sou entènèt ak pou sekirite a nan la
                    paj ou gen aksè. Epitou, lè ou gen aksè sou sit wèb la DUA, nou kolekte adrès la IP nan òdinatè a ou
                    ap itilize. Nou itilize adrès IP pou asire w ke, si w ap aplike oswa sètifye pou benefis yo, ou
                    ap fè sa soti nan Etazini oswa Kanada, ak pou antretyen sistèm. Nou pa divilge IP ou
                    adrese bay twazyèm pati, sof si nou detèmine ke nou bezwen fè sa pou rezon entegrite pwogram DUA.
                    Nou trete itilizasyon ou nan UI Online kòm konsantman ou nan koleksyon nou nan done sa yo.

Your social security number is needed to file a claim, to identify you, to obtain wage information, to determine your eligibility for benefits and for reporting your receipt of unemployment compensation to the IRS and other government agencies for the administration of their programs. Your application cannot be processed without all personal and employment information requested herein. 26 U.S.C. 6109(a) requires DUA to obtain your social security number from you when you file your claim for benefits.

Aplikasyon w lan pa ka trete san tout enfòmasyon pèsonèl ak travay yo mande nan dokiman sa a. 26 US.C. 6109 (a) egzije DUA jwenn nimewo sekirite sosyal ou nan men ou lè ou fè reklamasyon pou benefis ou yo.
